structure_sections.description: "İyi akşamlar değerli izleyenler" - The presenter, Hande Bayraktar, opens the program and introduces the main topics of the evening.

structure_sections.start_sentence: MHP lideri Devlet Bahçeli partisinin belediye başkanlarıyla
structure_sections.description: "MHP lideri Devlet Bahçeli partisinin belediye başkanlarıyla" - The segment covers various news stories, including statements from MHP leader Devlet Bahçeli regarding political issues, local elections, and responses to legal matters.
"MHP lideri partisinin 218 Belediye başkanıyla" - This part continues the news coverage, focusing on the MHP's local election results and Bahçeli's remarks on the political situation.

"Cumhurbaşkanlığı kabine görevinin başındadır" - This sentence serves as a transition within the news segment, moving from one topic to another related to the political landscape and Bahçeli's comments.
"Siyasette yumuşamanın Sözde kalmaması gerektiğine" - This section further elaborates on Bahçeli's views regarding political criticisms and the implications of recent legal decisions.

structure_sections.start_sentence: Eğitim Madem atacaktın bu 1 milyon günahsız niye okuttun
structure_sections.description: "Eğitim Madem atacaktın bu 1 milyon günahsız niye okuttun" - The closing remarks reflect on the educational issues raised during the broadcast, signaling the end of the program.
